alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 01 at 5:40PM CDT until June 01 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Minnesota, including the following county, Polk. * WHEN...Until 945 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 539 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Additional thunderstorms are developing over the area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fertile, Maple Bay, Beltrami, Greenview and Melvin.
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
